name: Pinky and Tealo
description:
"Your failure here is a metaphor. To learn for what, please resume climbing." - Rob DubbinI hope you don't get angry easily.

In this rage game, you control two characters, Pinky and Tealo. They are joined together by a chain and you must stick yourself to the goal to win (checkered tiles). There's only 8 levels.

This is made by only two people for the GMTK Game Jam! I wrote the code while my friend made the art and made the sound where you stick into the ground.

Controls

Stick into the ground
Left Click / Spacebar
Extend / Contract your chain
W / S

Music by Alan McKinney https://www.zapsplat.com/music/game-music-action-retro-8-bit-style-bouncy-hard-d...

Bugs to be noted (didn't have enough  time during jam):

  • You can die after winning
  • Pressing the goal multiple times restarts the win sequence, meaning don't click the goal multiple times in one level.
